# @param {Integer} n
# @param {Integer} k
# @return {Integer[]}
def circular_game_losers(n, k)
  # Initialize an array to keep track of the friends who have received the ball.
  received_ball = Array.new(n, false)

  # Start from the first friend.
  current_position = 0
  steps_multiplier = 1

  loop do
    # Calculate the next position.
    current_position = (current_position + (k * steps_multiplier) - 1) % n

    # If this friend has already received the ball, the game ends.
    break if received_ball[current_position]

    # Mark this friend as having received the ball.
    received_ball[current_position] = true

    # Increment the steps multiplier for the next turn.
    steps_multiplier += 1
  end

  # Identify the friends who never received the ball.
  losers = []
  received_ball.each_with_index do |received, index|
    losers << index + 1 unless received
  end

  losers
end
